com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IViewObserver

public interface IViewObserver

A class implements IViewObserver to indicate that it needs to be notified when the render settings for a page view has changed. The object can use this notification to re-render the page.

Method Summary
 void notify(IPageView viewToRender)
          Sets the page view that has changed and needs to be refreshed.
 

Method Detail

notify

public void notify(IPageView viewToRender)
Sets the page view that has changed and needs to be refreshed.
